short_summary: investigate and test foundation leakage repair solutions
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has a requirement the services of a Contractor to carry out all activities required to investigate and test the proposed foundation leakage repair solutions provided by a third party consultant hired by DFATD.
full_summary:
------------

### Tender for Foundation Investigations and Repairs at the Embassy of Canada to the Netherlands, in The Hague

**Reference Number:** cb-272-91928597

**Publication Date:** 2023-12-05

**Tender Closing Date:**  **Tender opened, but has expired.**

We are seeking a contractor to perform a comprehensive investigation and analysis of proposed foundation leakage solutions for the Embassy of Canada in the Netherlands, the Hague. The successful contractor will conduct detailed testing of various repair methods to identify the most suitable solution. Phase 2 of the project involves the construction of the selected repair solution.

### Essential Features

* **Scope of Work:**
    - Investigations and testing of proposed foundation leakage solutions
    - Identification of leaks and analysis of damage
    - Testing of different repair methods to determine the most effective solution
* **Awards Criteria:** Proposals will be evaluated based on the contractor's technical capabilities, experience in similar projects, and overall value offered.
* **Tender Requirements:**
    - Contractor must demonstrate expertise in similar projects
    - Suppliers must meet eligibility criteria as outlined in the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)

### Related Documents

All relevant documents and the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) can be downloaded from the following link: [24-255255-itq.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26717/24-255255-itq.pdf)

### Contact Information

To learn more about this tender and for any inquiries regarding the project, please contact Tanya Di Virgilio at [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca) or (343) 548-8491, in Ottawa.

### Governments of Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement. Suppliers must meet the requirements and rules as stipulated in these agreements. 

Due to formatting complexity and info maintanance, some changes were adjusted.
